import React from "react"; import "./image-carosel.styles.scss"; const ImageCarosel = () => { const mouseMoveHandler = event => { let mouseX = event.pageX/(event.target.width)*100/+"%"; let mouseY = event.pageY/(event.target.height)*100+"%"; event.target.style.transformOrigin = `${mouseX} ${mouseY}`; console.log(event.target.offsetLeft) } return (
); }; export default ImageCarosel;
